name: Hentai Teachers VR 虛擬現實
name_original: Hentai Teachers VR 虛擬現實
description:
Welcome to HENTAI University !!!
It is an adult only university, it is really worth studying here ...
You start your learning with a blank slate.
Each teacher has prepared questions to test your knowledge ...
Test your knowledge in the following categories:
- Modern technologies
- Film and music
- Geography
- Mathematics
- History of the world
In the university you get points for a correct answer.
Points can be exchanged for prizes from sexy teachers, they can be kisses or a sexy conversation in which you will find out what she likes the most in sex,
but if you are very good and collect the right number of points, you can count on much more pleasant moments including SEX with the teacher !!!
Features:
- Five sexy teachers
- Five categories of questions
- Collecting points
- Redeeming points for prizes, including: Sex with the teacher !!!
All characters in the game are adult.
developers: Hentai セックスグループ
publishers: Hentai セックスグループ
